title: The Little Gremlin Is Here To Stay
itunes:title: The Little Gremlin Is Here To Stay
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m a 32 year old single woman and one of my best friends recently got engaged to a man she’s known for less than a year. I have a close-knit group of girlfriends and we were all single before the quarantine, but one of our girlfriends got bored and started talking to a guy she met in the airport. We think she got lonely at home alone with nothing to do and the little man filled that void................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
